ReleaseNote:
# Xtract Universal 4.14.0 Several improvements related to Parquet ## Features - Parquet files are now compressed using *GZIP* - Parquet file format can now be selected *in S3 AWS* and *Azure* destinations - Time values will automatically be converted to TIME_MILLIS type
Exceptions: - `'______'` (*whitespaces*) -> 00:00:00 - `'240000'` -> 23:59:59 ## Bugs - Fixed a bug where empty results created invalid Parquet files - Fixed a bug where packed numbers had an incorrect total length
